moti mahal lucknow
Moti Mahal Delux â LucknowWelcome to Moti Mahal Delux, Lucknowâs ultimate destination for authentic Indian cuisine. Located at 94, Mahatma Gandhi Marg in the heart of Hazratganj, our restaurant offers a unique dining experience that blends rich Indian flavors with modern hospitality. Whether youâre here for a family gathering, casual dining, or a business meal, Moti Mahal Delux Lucknow guarantees an unforgettable culinary experience.Authentic Indian Cuisine in LucknowAt Moti Mahal Delux Lucknow, we take great pride in offering a wide variety of Indian dishes, made with the freshest ingredients. Our chefs specialize in creating flavorful curries, perfectly grilled tandoori items, and a range of vegetarian and non-vegetarian delicacies. Lucknowâs food enthusiasts have come to rely on us for the finest Indian dining.Why Choose Moti Mahal Delux in Lucknow?	â¢	Iconic Legacy: With over 100 outlets globally, Moti Mahal Delux is known for its authentic Indian cuisine. Our Lucknow outlet upholds this legacy by delivering high-quality dishes with exceptional service.	â¢	Signature Dishes: Indulge in our famous butter chicken, tandoori chicken, and dal makhaniâeach prepared with the highest attention to detail.	â¢	Prime Location: Conveniently located on Mahatma Gandhi Marg in Hazratganj, our Lucknow restaurant is easily accessible with ample parking available.	â¢	Inviting Ambiance: Whether itâs a casual meal or a special celebration, the warm atmosphere at Moti Mahal Delux Lucknow ensures a delightful experience.Menu Highlights at Moti Mahal LucknowOur extensive menu offers a variety of Indian favorites to satisfy every palate. Some of the most-loved dishes at Moti Mahal Delux Lucknow include:	â¢	Butter Chicken: A Moti Mahal classic, our butter chicken is cooked in a rich, creamy tomato sauce with tender chicken pieces.	â¢	Tandoori Chicken: Marinated in a blend of spices and yogurt, then grilled to perfection in our traditional tandoor for a smoky flavor.	â¢	Paneer Tikka: Marinated cubes of paneer, grilled in the tandoor, bursting with traditional Indian spices.	â¢	Dal Makhani: A slow-cooked, creamy lentil dish, perfect when paired with naan or rice.Location & Contact Information	â¢	Address: Moti Mahal Delux, 94, Mahatma Gandhi Marg, Raj Bhavan Colony, Hazratganj, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226001Operating Hours	â¢	Monday to Sunday: 12:00 PM â 11:00 PMLocal Reviews from LucknowHereâs what our guests in Lucknow have to say:	â¢	âThe butter chicken is amazing! One of the best Indian restaurants in Hazratganj.â â Rohit M.	â¢	âGreat ambiance and delicious food. The tandoori dishes are exceptional!â â Shruti P.	â¢	âMoti Mahal Delux Lucknow is my favorite spot for Indian cuisine. Highly recommended!â â Rajiv K.Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)Q: Is parking available at the restaurant?A: Yes, we offer ample parking for our guests at our Lucknow location.Q: Do you offer vegetarian and vegan options?A: Yes, we have a variety of vegetarian dishes, and some can be customized to be vegan.Q: Can I book the restaurant for private events?A: Yes, we accept bookings for private events such as birthdays, corporate events, and family gatherings.
